item.title: 3. 7-billion-year-old rocks reveal how Earth and the Moon were born

item.title: Sleeping less than 7 hours could cut years off your life
item.description: Sleep isn’t just about feeling rested—it may be one of the strongest predictors of how long you live. Researchers analyzing nationwide data found that...
